adm:managed-object.name: virtual-attribute
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis: are responsible for dynamically generating attribute values that appear in entries but are not persistently stored in the backend.

adm:property.name: java-class
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
The fully-qualified name of the Java class that provides the
implementation.

adm:property.name: enabled
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Indicate whether the
is enabled for use.

adm:property.name: attribute-type
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the attribute type for the attribute whose values should be dynamically assigned by the virtual attribute.

adm:property.name: base-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the base DNs for the branches containing entries that may be eligible to use this virtual attribute.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The location of the entry in the server will not be taken into account when determining whether an entry is eligible to use this virtual attribute.

adm:property.name: group-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the DNs for the groups whose members may be eligible to use this virtual attribute.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: Group membership will not be taken into account when determining whether an entry is eligible to use this virtual attribute.

adm:property.name: filter
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the search filters for entries that may be eligible to use this virtual attribute.

adm:property.name: conflict-behavior
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the behavior that the server should exhibit for entries that contain one or more real values for the associated attribute.

adm:value.name: real-overrides-virtual
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Any real values contained in the entry should be preserved and virtual values should not be generated.

adm:value.name: virtual-overrides-real
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Any real values contained in the entry should be suppressed and virtual values should be generated.

adm:value.name: merge-real-and-virtual
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Any real values contained in the entry should be preserved and merged with the set of generated virtual values.
